get.description:
Retrieve a specific shift by its ID.

Args:
    shift_id (str): The unique identifier of the shift.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the shift is not found.

post.description:
Create a new shift.

Args:
    shift (ShiftCreate): The shift data to create.

Returns:
    Shift: The created shift.

example.msg: Input should be a valid datetime or date

get.summary: Retrieve shift data based on shift attributes like shift_id,match type and entity status
get.description:
Retrieve all shifts.
This endpoint returns a list of all shifts in the system.

example.msg: Input should be a valid datetime or date

put.description:
Update an existing shift.

Args:
    shift_id (str): The unique identifier of the shift to update.
    shift (ShiftUpdate): The updated shift data.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the shift is not found.

Update an existing shift end time.

Args:
    shift_id (str): The unique identifier of the shift to update.
    shift (Shift): The updated shift data.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the shift is not found.

get.description:
Retrieve the current active shift.

This endpoint returns the most recent shift based on the last modified or
created time.
It does not require any input parameters and is used to retrieve the latest shift
that is currently active in the system.

Returns:
    Shift: The latest shift object in the system.
    HTTPStatus: HTTP 200 OK on success.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If there is an issue retrieving the current shift
     or if no shift is found.

example.msg: Input should be a valid datetime or date

patch.description:
Partially update an existing shift.

Args:
    shift_id (str): The unique identifier of the shift to update.
    shift (ShiftUpdate): The partial shift data to update.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the shift is not found.

post.summary: Create a new shift log comment
post.description:
Create a new shift log comment.

Args:
    shift (ShiftCreate): The shift data to create.

Returns:
    ShiftLogComment: The created shift log comment.

example.msg: Input should be a valid datetime or date

get.summary: Retrieve shift log comments based on shift ID and EB ID
get.description:
Retrieve shifts data based on Shift ID and EB ID.
This endpoint returns a list of all shifts in the system.

Args:
    shift_id(optional): Shift ID
    eb_id(optional): EB ID

Returns:
    ShiftLogComment: Shift Log Comments match found

put.summary: Update an existing shift log comments
put.description:
Update an existing shift log comment.

Args:
    shift_id (str): The unique identifier of the shift to update.
    shift_log_comment (ShiftLogComment): The updated shift log comment  data.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the shift is not found.

put.summary: Upload image for Shift log comment
put.description:
Uploads FIle to s3 and updates the relevant Shift Log comment image with the URL

Args:
    comment_id: Comment ID
    file(s): File(s) to be uploaded

Returns:
     shift_log_comment (ShiftLogComment): The updated shift log comment  data.

post.description:
Upload one or more image files for a specific shift.

This endpoint allows uploading multiple image files associated
with a particular shift identified by the shift_id.

Args:
    shift_id (str): The unique identifier of the shift to update.
    shift_operator (str): The shift operator name.
    eb_id (str): The EB ID associated with the shift.
    files (list[UploadFile]): A list of files to be uploaded.

Returns:
    list: A list containing elements:
        - image_response: The media (image) data associated with the comment.
        - HTTPStatus.OK: HTTP 200 status code indicating successful retrieval.

get.description:
Retrieve media associated with a shift comment.

Args:
    comment_id (Optional[int]): The unique identifier of the comment.
        If None, returns all media.

Returns:
    tuple: A tuple containing:
        - image_response: The media data from the shift service
        - HTTPStatus.OK: HTTP 200 status code indicating successful retrieval

post.description:
Create a new shift comment.

Args:
    shift_comment (ShiftComment): The shift comment to create.

Returns:
    ShiftComment: The created shift comment.

get.summary: Retrieve shift comments based on shift ID
get.description:
Retrieve shift comments based on shift ID.
This endpoint returns a list of all shifts in the system.

Args:
    shift_id(optional): Shift ID

Returns:
    ShiftComment: Shift Comments match found

example.message: No shifts log comments found for the given query.

put.description:
Update an existing shift comment.

Args:
    comment_id (str): The unique identifier of the shift to update.
    shift_comment (ShiftComment): The updated shift comment data.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the shift is not found.

post.description:
Upload image for shift.

Args:
    shift_id (str): The unique identifier of the shift to update.
    shift_operator (str): The shift operator name.
    file (list[UploadFile]): A list of files to be uploaded.

Returns:
    ShiftLogComment: The created shift log comment.

put.description:
Upload one or more image files for a specific shift.

This endpoint allows uploading multiple image files associated
with a particular shift identified by the shift_id.

Args:
    comment_id (Optional[int]): The unique identifier of the
        comment to which the images will be associated.
    files (list[UploadFile]): A list of files to be uploaded.
        Each file should be an image. This parameter uses
        FastAPI's File(...) for handling file uploads.

Returns:
    list: A list containing elements:
        - image_response: The media (image) data associated with the comment.
        - HTTPStatus.OK: HTTP 200 status code indicating successful retrieval.

get.description:
Retrieve media associated with a shift comment.

Args:
    comment_id (Optional[int]): The unique identifier of the comment.
        If None, returns all media.

Returns:
    tuple: A tuple containing:
        - image_response: The media data from the shift service
        - HTTPStatus.OK: HTTP 200 status code indicating successful retrieval

post.description:
Create a new annotation.

Args:
    shift_annotation (ShiftAnnotation): The shift annotation to create.

Returns:
    ShiftAnnotation: The created shift annotation.

get.summary: Retrieve shift annotations based on shift ID
get.description:
Retrieve all annotations related to given shift ID.
This endpoint returns a list of all annotations in the system.

Args:
    shift_id(optional): Shift ID

Returns:
    ShiftAnnotation: Shift Annotations match found

example.message: No shifts annotation found for the given query.

put.description:
Update an existing shift annotation.

Args:
    annotation_id (str): The unique identifier of the shift to update.
    shift_annotation (ShiftAnnotation): The updated shift annotation data.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If the shift is not found.

Filter.title: Filter
Filter.description: Enum representing the different types of matching available for filtering shifts.

Media.title: Media
Media.description:
Represents media associated with a shift in the SLT Shift Log Tool.

:param type Optional[str]: The type of media (e.g., image, video).
:param path Optional[str]: The path to the media file.

Shift.title: Shift
Shift.description:
Represents a shift in the SLT Shift Log Tool.


:param shift_logs Optional[List[ShiftLogs]]: The logs associated with the shift.
:param media Optional[List[Media]]: The media associated with the shift.
:param metadata Optional[Metadataa]: Metadata contains shift additional info
like shift created_on, created_bye etc...

ShiftAnnotation.title: ShiftAnnotation
ShiftAnnotation.description:
Represents a annotation associated with a shift in the Shift.

:param annotation Optional[str]: The text of the annotation.
:param operator_name Optional[str]: The name of the operator who made
 the annotation.
:param shift_id Optional[str]: The unique identifier of the shift the annotation
 belongs to.
:param metadata Optional[Metadata]: Metadata contains shift additional info
like shift created_on, created_by etc...

ShiftComment.title: ShiftComment
ShiftComment.description:
Represents a comment associated with a shift in the Shift.

:param comment Optional[str]: The text of the comment.
:param operator_name Optional[str]: The name of the operator who made the comment.
:param shift_id Optional[str]: The unique identifier of the shift the comment
 belongs to.
:param image Optional[List[Media]]: The image associated with the comment.
:param metadata Optional[Metadata]: Metadata contains shift additional info
like shift created_on, created_by etc...

ShiftLogComment.title: ShiftLogComment
ShiftLogComment.description:
Represents a comment associated with a shift in the SLT Shift Log Tool.

:param log_comment Optional[str]: The text of the comment.
:param operator_name Optional[str]: The name of the operator who made the comment.
:param shift_id Optional[str]: The unique identifier of the shift
 the comment belongs to.
:param image Optional[List[Media]]: The image associated with the comment.
:param eb_id Optional[str]: The unique identifier of the EB associated
 with the comment.
:param metadata Optional[Metadata]: Metadata contains shift additional info
 like shift created_on, created_by etc...

ShiftLogs.title: ShiftLogs
ShiftLogs.description:
Represents logs associated with a shift in the SLT Shift Log Tool.

:param info Optional[dict]: Information about the log.
:param source Optional[str]: The source of the log.
:param log_time Optional[datetime]: The time the log was created.
